reviewText: A must have for any Canadian hockey fan. When there was no hockey last year I must've watched this ten times. A behind the scenes look at how the Gretter and company put together the golden boys. And what about the Gold rush of 1980? That was 26 years ago and we still hear about it like it happened yesterday. Give the country that created the game a moment in the sun, I know it's hard too because Canadian players and teams make miracles happen on a daily basis, but that's because we rely on our hearts (oops, I've given away the secret to Canadian hockey). I mean seriously, what do you want, a Disney sequel to Miracle?
